entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
